decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.  REASON:	To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with policies 4.1 and 5.9 of the adopted Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' 2004 | No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policy 5.9 of the adopted Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' 2004
description: Single storey rear and rear/side (wrap-around) extension (following demolition of existing rear extension)
